short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of using a grade calculator to find your current grade in a Queen's onQ course?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension calculate your current grade as well as your final grade in progress. 
*This extension will only work on the grades tab on onQ. Any missing information in onQ will not be taken into account. 0's in onQ will be overlooked when calculating current grade as they are assumed to be grades that have not been submitted yet.
